Stylish hair and happy faces for his and hers since 2009.

My Story

Carolyn Lasare Owner/Salon Professional

Since an early age, I have been INSPIRED to do hair. I even had a home salon in my basement growing up. It was while working my first salon job assisting at age 16 when I knew I would one day open my own shop.

Read More

Anybody can cut hair off, but a barber knows when and where to stop.

Inspired Salon by Carolyn specializes in stylish hair and happy faces for his & hers. Hair cuts, coloring, keratin, scalp treatments, massages, facials, waxing, styling, special occasion hair, make-up, young, old, he, she, gay, straight, asian, black, white, tan I can get your hair inspired again!

Services

History

Established in 2009.

I started beauty school and interning in salons in 2009. Ever since my passion has grown. Every day i love bringing out the beauty in others and being sure all my clients have the best salon experience. I educate my clients and tell them what looks would look best, how to style & maintain. Book an appointment you will not regret it!
